name: The Golden Medallion
overview: The Golden Medallion is an adventure game. The story begins when sorcerer Yenkin's feelings for the princess Perl have been rejected by her father. As a revenge, he decided to kidnap the object of his love. Taking the role of Dobromir the player must reach the land of Owlmountains and find the Golden Medallion. The game is divided into several locations with different puzzles. A task's solution open the access to the next area. The game features land, underwater and air stages.
